name: Ext_R5_GuidanceResponse_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.GuidanceResponse.reason for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents GuidanceResponse.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/GuidanceResponse|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Describes the reason for the guidance response in coded or textual form, or Indicates the reason the request was initiated. This is typically provided as a parameter to the evaluation and echoed by the service, although for some use cases, such as subscription- or event-based scenarios, it may provide an indication of the cause for the response.
element.comment: `GuidanceResponse.reason` maps to R4B `GuidanceResponse.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `GuidanceResponse.reason` maps to R4B `GuidanceResponse.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
